body:
Sorry but we will not add features in stable release anymore. Also
update_attribute will be only removed in 4.1 so you don't need to rush.

Rafael Mendonça França
On Aug 4, 2012 2:28 PM, "Philip Arndt" <
reply@reply.github.com>
wrote:

> So for some reason this got reverted in
> 2f930df518077bb2a00ab6d6a6cf579f0d88e250 with the rationale that it was
> supposed to go out in 3.2.7 which was never the case.
>
> If all of the deprecations were reverted (which seems to be the case) then
> reverting this is more consistent however can we have the `update_columns`
> method available (I'm happy to make this happen) for those of us who wish
> to update to the new APIs early?
> Thanks :)
>
> ---
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7159#issuecomment-7503398
>
